data.comment: Today's referee, Maurizio Mariani, has blown to start the match.
Today's referee, Maurizio Mariani, has blown to start the match.
Fabian Ruiz returns to the field for Napoli after picking up a slight injury.
Maurizio Mariani awards the home team a throw-in.
Napoli needs to be cautious. Torino have an attacking throw-in.
Torino drive upfield and Sasa Lukic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Napoli defender.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Important block from the Napoli defence as Lorenzo De Silvestri fires in a strike for Torino.
Throw-in for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
Lorenzo Insigne for Napoli gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
Maurizio Mariani signals a throw-in for Napoli, close to Torino's area.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maurizio Mariani awards Napoli a goal kick.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Napoli throw-in in Torino's half.
Throw-in Torino.
Daniele Baselli is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Daniele Baselli is back on his feet again.
Napoli's Arek Milik gets in a shot on goal at Stadio San Paolo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Napoli push upfield but Maurizio Mariani quickly pulls them for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
Napoli drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick Napoli.
Can Napoli capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Napoli capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Napoli close to the penalty box.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Napoli close to the penalty box.
Kostas Manolas scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Lorenzo Insigne.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Napoli's Matteo Politano breaks free at Stadio San Paolo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio San Paolo.
Lorenzo Insigne of Napoli smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Napoli to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Napoli in Naples.
Torino have a goal kick.
Lorenzo Insigne for Napoli drives towards goal at Stadio San Paolo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Torino.
Napoli's Lorenzo Insigne gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Torino have a goal kick.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Napoli.
Tomas Rincon (Torino) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Torino.
Maurizio Mariani awards Napoli a goal kick.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Torino's Simone Zaza has been booked in Naples.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Napoli's Arek Milik goes close with a header against the bar.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Naples.
Napoli push forward at Stadio San Paolo and Matteo Politano gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Torino defence.
Ball safe as Napoli is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half has come to a close in Naples.
Fabian Ruiz is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The second half has started at Stadio San Paolo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Goal kick for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
Ball safe as Napoli is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Torino's Cristian Ansaldi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Napoli defender.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Naples, Arek Milik of Napoli is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Arek Milik (Napoli) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
In Naples Napoli attack through Piotr Zielinski. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
Maurizio Mariani awards the away team a throw-in.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Torino have a dangerous throw-in.
Torino have a dangerous throw-in.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Stanislav Lobotka (Napoli) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Torino.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Napoli are in shooting range from this free kick.
Moreno Longo is making the team's first substitution at Stadio San Paolo with Soualiho Meite replacing Daniele Baselli.
In Naples, Arek Milik (Napoli) misses the target with a header.
Torino have a goal kick.
Napoli needs to be cautious. Torino have an attacking throw-in.
Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Napoli's half?
Maurizio Mariani awards Torino a goal kick.
Giovanni Di Lorenzo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Napoli.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Free kick Torino.
Gennaro Gattuso (Napoli) is making a first substitution, with Dries Mertens replacing Arek Milik.
Throw-in for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
Napoli are pushing forward but Matteo Politano's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
Simone Zaza of Torino gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
Attention is being given to Napoli’s Stanislav Lobotka and play has been suspended briefly.
Torino's Andrea Belotti misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
Napoli’s Stanislav Lobotka is on his feet again at Stadio San Paolo.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Napoli.
The home team has substituted Stanislav Lobotka with Allan. Gennaro Gattuso is thus making his second change.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Great finish from Giovanni Di Lorenzo to give Napoli a 2-0 lead.
Great play from Dries Mertens to set up the goal.
Simone Verdi is on a sub for Simone Zaza for Torino.
Simone Edera is replacing Tomas Rincon for Torino at Stadio San Paolo.
The home team have replaced Matteo Politano with Eljif Elmas. This is the third substitution made today by Gennaro Gattuso.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Torino.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Fabian Ruiz (Napoli) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Torino have a goal kick.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Maurizio Mariani blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Goal! Simone Edera (Torino) scores with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-1.
Cristian Ansaldi with an assist there.
Cristian Ansaldi for Torino has been booked by Maurizio Mariani and receives a first yellow card.
Allan (Napoli) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
